page.title: 09REFUGEE CONT.
page.content: Now I'm here and I go to school every day.I also go to Chinese school on Saturdays.At home I help my sister with the housework.My Dad works in a take-away,and he gets a day off on Mondays.I miss my Gran a lot.My little brother doesn't even know what our Gran looks like.Sometimes my Gran sends pictures of her and her friends and my little brother will ask which one of these women is my Gran.I wouldn't really like to live in Vietnam now.I would like my Gran to come here and live with us.Mostly I think of my Gran before I go to sleep. I dream I am on "This Is Your Life" and then a big surprise for me - my Gran comes along and I get to give her a big hug.
